addLiquidity((address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Tx will fail if adding `base == 0 && quote == 0` / `liquidity == 0`- `AddLiquidityParams.useTakerBalance` is only accept `false` now

liquidate((address,address,uint256,uint2.details: If trader has open orders, need to call `cancelAllExcessOrders` first

returns.base: The amount of baseToken the taker got or spent
returns.quote: The amount of quoteToken the taker got or spent

openPosition((address,bool,bool,uint256,.details: - `OpenPositionParams.oppositeAmountBound`     - B2Q + exact input, want more output quote as possible, so we set a lower bound of output quote     - B2Q + exact output, want less input base as possible, so we set a upper bound of input base     - Q2B + exact input, want more output base as possible, so we set a lower bound of output base     - Q2B + exact output, want less input quote as possible, so we set a upper bound of input quote     > when it's set to 0, it will disable slippage protection entirely regardless of exact input or output     > when it's over or under the bound, it will be reverted- `OpenPositionParams.sqrtPriceLimitX96`     - B2Q: the price cannot be less than this value after the swap     - Q2B: the price cannot be greater than this value after the swap     > it will fill the trade until it reaches the price limit but WON'T REVERT     > when it's set to 0, it will disable price limit;     > when it's 0 and exact output, the output amount is required to be identical to the param amount

returns.base: The amount of baseToken the taker got or spent
returns.quote: The amount of quoteToken the taker got or spent

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeLiquidity((address,uint256,uint256.details: remove liquidity will transfer maker impermanent position to taker position, if `liquidity` of RemoveLiquidityParams struct is zero, the action will collect fee from pool to maker

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

LiquidityChanged(address,address,address.notice: Emitted when maker's liquidity of a order changed

PositionChanged(address,address,int256,i.notice: Emitted when taker's position is being changed

PositionLiquidated(address,address,uint2.notice: Emitted when taker position is being liquidated

addLiquidity((address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Maker can call `addLiquidity` to provide liquidity on Uniswap V3 pool

liquidate((address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: If trader is underwater, any one can call `liquidate` to liquidate this trader

openPosition((address,bool,bool,uint256,.notice: Trader can call `openPosition` to long/short on baseToken market

removeLiquidity((address,uint256,uint256.notice: Maker can call `removeLiquidity` to remove liquidity
